name: Introduction to Art History
description: This course is an introduction to the history of art, focusing on the development of Western and non-Western art from ancient to modern times.

name: Renaissance Art
description: This course examines the development of Renaissance art in Europe from the 14th century to the early 17th century.

name: High Renaissance Art
description: This course focuses on the development of High Renaissance art in Europe from the early 16th century to the early 17th century.
